title: T206 PSA 3 Sovereign Devore to trade...TRADED
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: T206 PSA 3 Sovereign Devore to trade...TRADED
posts.post_content:
Anybody want to trade for a similar T205/T206 Sovereign back?

Cheers,
Geno

[URL="https://www.flickr.com/photos/153363453@N07/35496899454/in/dateposted-public/"]https://www.flickr.com/photos/153363453@N07/35496899454/in/dateposted-public/[/URL]

[URL="https://www.flickr.com/photos/153363453@N07/35524047113/in/dateposted-public/"]https://www.flickr.com/photos/153363453@N07/35524047113/in/dateposted-public/[/URL]
I can't figure out how to make Flickr post the actual image...anybody else know how?

Go to the right-pointing arrow in the lower right and click on it. When the window pops up, click on "BBCode" at the top, copy the address that shows up, and paste it directly into your post.

[url=https://flic.kr/p/W5JTvQ][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4349/35496899454_61f028dd73_z.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/W5JTvQ]T206 Devore Front 1[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/153363453@N07/]Geno Wagner[/url], on Flickr

You can eliminate the "T206 Devore Front 1 by Geno Wagner on Flickr" part by deleting that part of the address after you post it, from the second "[url=" part to the end: 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/W5JTvQ][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4349/35496899454_61f028dd73_z.jpg[/img][/url]
